name: Bug Hunter Fluttor
description:
Game development might look all fun from outside, but talk to any game dev and you'll get to know how difficult it is to make any sort of game that people might enjoy. Bug Hunter Fluttor is my funny take on this topic. It is short, simple and maybe completely absurd. But it is what it is.

This game was made for the Zapp! Vikings Competition using zapp.run

Controls: ActionKeysMove leftA or Left arrowMove rightD or Right arrowJumpW or Up arrow AttackSpace
